Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2013 04:12AM MJ01 wrote: Thanks for the reply. But I'm quite sure I have this disease. We have family history of breast cancer. I hate it because I don't know how to say this to my parents. I know they will be affected by this as well as my other siblings. I have pain on my shoulder down to my arm which I felt years ago. My chest x-ray 5 years ago was first pleural adhesion, then last year I know have pleural effusion on my right lung. A sign of metastasis. I have this lump on my breast and my nipples are itchy and have a tingling sensation and there's this flake thing falling off. I'm a nurse and my mom wants me to work abroad and he doesn't know everything bout it. There are medical exams to work abroad and I'm pretty sure they'll know about it. I'm now losing hope and just wish I was never born. I don't know where I'm going. I'm too afraid to face everything what I'm going to deal with.
Posts.Title: I'm afraid I have cancer. MJ01 beacon800

Posts.Content: Jan 28, 2013 04:37AM MJ01 wrote: Thank you all for your encouragement. I hope and pray that this will come to an end.
Posts.Title: I'm afraid I have cancer. MJ01 beacon800

Posts.Content: MJ01 wrote: Hi everyone. I'm 26 years old and new to this site. I am having a suspicion that I have cancer. I am a nurse and afraid to know. I am pretty sure that I do have breast cancer. I have every signs and symptoms a person that has breast cancer. I had my chest x ray done and it shows that I have pleural adhesion on my left lung and effusion on my right. I'm afraid. I don't know what to do. I don't want to be a burden to my family.
